com.jbion.utils.drawing.grids

Class GridDrawer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jbion.utils.drawing.grids.GridDrawer

  • public class GridDrawer
extends Object
    A class containing useful methods to draw grids. It uses the Character constants in BoxChars.
    Author:
    Joffrey Bion

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  GridDrawer.BorderType
      Represents the style of a border.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GridDrawer()
      Creates a new GridDrawer with default borders.
      GridDrawer(GridDrawer.BorderType type)
      Creates a new GridDrawer with the specified GridDrawer.BorderType for both internal and external borders.
      GridDrawer(GridDrawer.BorderType internal, GridDrawer.BorderType external)
      Creates a new GridDrawer with the specified GridDrawer.BorderTypes for internal and external borders.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Returns a String representing the specified Grid.

      Creates a new GridDrawer with the specified GridDrawer.BorderTypes for internal and external borders.
      void setBorderType(GridDrawer.BorderType internal, GridDrawer.BorderType external)

    • Constructor Detail

      • GridDrawer

        public GridDrawer()
        Creates a new GridDrawer with default borders.

      • GridDrawer

        public GridDrawer(GridDrawer.BorderType type)
        Creates a new GridDrawer with the specified GridDrawer.BorderType for both internal and external borders.
        Parameters:
        type - The border type for internal and external borders.

      • GridDrawer

        public GridDrawer(GridDrawer.BorderType internal,
          GridDrawer.BorderType external)
           throws IllegalArgumentException
        Creates a new GridDrawer with the specified GridDrawer.BorderTypes for internal and external borders.
        Parameters:
        internal - The border type for internal borders.
        external - The border type for external borders.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If GridDrawer.BorderType.HEAVY and GridDrawer.BorderType.DOUBLE types are combined.

    • Method Detail

      • setBorderType

        public void setBorderType(GridDrawer.BorderType type)
        Creates a new GridDrawer with the specified GridDrawer.BorderTypes for internal and external borders.
        Parameters:
        type - The border type for internal and external borders.

      • setBorderType

        public void setBorderType(GridDrawer.BorderType internal,
                 GridDrawer.BorderType external)
                   throws IllegalArgumentException
        Sets the type of the internal and external borders. Heavy/Double combinations are not supported because the necessary T characters it would need don't exist.
        Parameters:
        internal - The border type for internal borders.
        external - The border type for external borders.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If GridDrawer.BorderType.HEAVY and GridDrawer.BorderType.DOUBLE types are combined.

      • drawGrid

        public String drawGrid(Grid g)
        Returns a String representing the specified Grid.
        Parameters:
        g - The Grid to get the values from.
        Returns:
        a String representing the specified Grid.
